title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 10025.11 - Failure to comply with article 6, section 89(3) and (4)(a) of the Public Officers Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 10025.11 - Failure to comply with article 6, section 89(3) and (4)(a) of the Public Officers Law

State Regulations

Statutory authority: Executive Law, § 709; Public Officers

Law, §§ 87(1)(b), 89(3), (4)(a)

Failure of the records access officer or chief counsel to
comply with article 6, section 89(3) and/ or 4(a) of the Public Officers Law
shall be deemed a denial of a record inspection request for the purpose of
permitting the aggrieved party to proceed immediately with an appropriate
appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§
10025.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
